> PS: Is this thread a troll?

Depends on how the OP reacts now, so it seems to me. Let's await wether
he is willing to reconsider his position and to be responsive to the
most serious objections.

Don't get me wrong - I don't expect him to suddenly agree that Junit is
a great thing. I just want to see a hint that he seriously considered
some of the strongest arguments.

Until that happens, I will keep out of this thread.

Regards, Ilja
